title: Tweezers, ca. 1760
inscribed: On silver mount engraved: M. RENNER
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Pair of tweezers with screw thread in the middle and chiseled handle with fish-bone decoration, fits into sharpener.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tweezers, ca. 1760.
ca. 1760. Silver. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-270-e.
